properties.description:
Author: Jilly Webster
Date: 28/07/2023
Description: ASCD-20271 - this pipeline will load data from MS Dynamics (SQL server) Asc_apaworkitem table to STAGE_CDI (Oracle) CRM_PLAT_DYN_APAWORKITEM_STG table.

activities.name: cd-TD_CRM_PLAT_DYN_APAWORKITEM_STG
activities.description: pulls data from MS Dynamic Asc_apaworkitem table and copies to the STAGE_LOAD table TD_CRM_PLAT_DYN_APAWORKITEM_STG using SQL query

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select ASC_APAWORKITEMID,
       ASC_WORKITEMNUMBER,
       ASC_CATEGORY,
       ASC_CLIENTMASTERID,
       ASC_CLIENTMASTERIDNAME,
       OWNERID,
       OWNERIDNAME,
       ASC_ORIGIN,
       STATUSCODE,
       ASC_DUETOCOMMENCE,
       ASC_TITLE,
       ASC_DATECOMPLETED,
       ASC_DATESETPENDING,
       ASC_TAXABLELUMPSUM,
       ASC_SONATATRANSACTIONREF,
       ASC_AUTHORISED,
       ASC_AUTHORISEDBY,
       ASC_DATEAUTHORISED,
       ASC_SLADATE,
       ASC_PARENTAPAWORKITEMID,
       ASC_PARENTAPAWORKITEMIDNAME,
       ASC_SLATYPE,
       ASC_7DAYREMINDERDUE,
       ASC_DAYSONHOLD,
       ASC_SELLDOWNDUE,
       ASC_VALUEOFCRYSTALLISATION,
       ASC_CLOSUREOFPLAN,
       ASC_RAISEDBYCOMPANYID,
       ASC_RAISEDBYCOMPANYIDNAME,
       ASC_RAISEDBYCONTACTID,
       ASC_RAISEDBYCONTACTIDNAME,
       ASC_BROKERID,
       ASC_BROKERIDNAME,
       ASC_NEWBUSINESSID,
       ASC_NEWBUSINESSIDNAME,
       CREATEDBY,
       CREATEDBYNAME,
       MODIFIEDBY,
       MODIFIEDBYNAME,
       CREATEDON,
       MODIFIEDON,
       ASC_NEWOREXISTING,
       ASC_ONLINECLIENTSETUP,
       ASC_BLUEBUTTONSETUP,
       ASC_DATEBLUEBUTTONSETUP,
       ASC_BLUEBUTTONSETUPBY,
       ASC_BLUEBUTTONSETUPCHECKED,
       ASC_DATEBLUEBUTTONSETUPCHECKED,
       ASC_BLUEBUTTONSETUPCHECKEDBY,
       ASC_IMAGOSETUP,
       ASC_DATEIMAGOSETUP,
       ASC_IMAGOSETUPBY,
       ASC_OCCUPATIONOPTOUT,
       ASC_DATEOCCOPTOUTSET,
       ASC_OCCOPTOUTSETBY,
       ASC_CONTRIBUTIONSSETUP,
       ASC_DATEPAYMENTSCONTRIBUTIONSPREADSHEETUPDATE,
       ASC_PAYMENTSCONTRIBUTIONSPREADSHEETUPDATEDBY,
       ASC_TRANSFERINITIATED,
       ASC_DATETRANSFERSINITIATED,
       ASC_TRANSFERSINITIATEDBY,
       ASC_WELCOMELETTERGENERATED,
       ASC_DATEWELCOMELETTERGENERATED,
       ASC_WELCOMELETTERGENERATEDBY,
       ASC_EMAILCONFIRMATIONS,
       ASC_DATEEMAILCONFIRMATIONS,
       ASC_EMAILCONFIRMATIONSBY,
       ASC_SENTFORCHECKING,
       ASC_DATESENTFORCHECKING,
       ASC_SENTFORCHECKINGBY,
       ASC_CHECKINGCOMPLETE,
       ASC_DATECHECKINGCOMPLETED,
       ASC_CHECKINGCOMPLETEDBY,
       ASC_WELCOMELETTERSENT,
       ASC_DATEWELCOMELETTERSENT,
       ASC_WELCOMELETTERSENTBY,
       ASC_CLOSEASINCOMPLETE,
       ASC_DATECLOSEDASINCOMPLETE,
       ASC_CLOSEDASINCOMPLETEBY,
       ASC_REASONCLOSEDASINCOMPLETE,
       ASC_ASSIGNFLAG,
       TRANSACTIONCURRENCYID,
       TRANSACTIONCURRENCYIDNAME,
       ASC_BLUEBUTTONSETUPBYID,
       ASC_SENTFORCHECKINGBYID,
       STATECODE
  from DBO.ASC_APAWORKITEM

activities.name: sp-UPDATE_BATCH_AUDIT-CRM_PLAT_DYN_APAWORKITEM_STG
activities.description: Writing audit data for the Copy Data activity that has just run

activities.name: cd-CRM_PLAT_DYN_APAWORKITEM_STG
activities.description: pulls data from STAGE_LOAD table TD_CRM_PLAT_DYN_APAWORKITEM_STG and copies to the STAGE_CDI table CRM_PLAT_DYN_APAWORKITEM_STG using SQL query

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select TCPDAS.S_APAWORKITEM_KEY,
       TCPDAS.S_CREATE_DATETIME,
       TCPDAS.S_UPDATE_DATETIME,
       TCPDAS.ASC_APAWORKITEMID,
       TCPDAS.ASC_WORKITEMNUMBER,
       TCPDAS.ASC_CATEGORY,
       TCPDAS.ASC_CLIENTMASTERID,
       TCPDAS.ASC_CLIENTMASTERIDNAME,
       TCPDAS.OWNERID,
       TCPDAS.OWNERIDNAME,
       TCPDAS.ASC_ORIGIN,
       TCPDAS.STATUSCODE,
       TCPDAS.ASC_DUETOCOMMENCE,
       TCPDAS.ASC_TITLE,
       TCPDAS.ASC_DATECOMPLETED,
       TCPDAS.ASC_DATESETPENDING,
       TCPDAS.ASC_TAXABLELUMPSUM,
       TCPDAS.ASC_SONATATRANSACTIONREF,
       TCPDAS.ASC_AUTHORISED,
       TCPDAS.ASC_AUTHORISEDBY,
       TCPDAS.ASC_DATEAUTHORISED,
       TCPDAS.ASC_SLADATE,
       TCPDAS.ASC_PARENTAPAWORKITEMID,
       TCPDAS.ASC_PARENTAPAWORKITEMIDNAME,
       TCPDAS.ASC_SLATYPE,
       TCPDAS.ASC_7DAYREMINDERDUE,
       TCPDAS.ASC_DAYSONHOLD,
       TCPDAS.ASC_SELLDOWNDUE,
       TCPDAS.ASC_VALUEOFCRYSTALLISATION,
       TCPDAS.ASC_CLOSUREOFPLAN,
       TCPDAS.ASC_RAISEDBYCOMPANYID,
       TCPDAS.ASC_RAISEDBYCOMPANYIDNAME,
       TCPDAS.ASC_RAISEDBYCONTACTID,
       TCPDAS.ASC_RAISEDBYCONTACTIDNAME,
       TCPDAS.ASC_BROKERID,
       TCPDAS.ASC_BROKERIDNAME,
       TCPDAS.ASC_NEWBUSINESSID,
       TCPDAS.ASC_NEWBUSINESSIDNAME,
       TCPDAS.CREATEDBY,
       TCPDAS.CREATEDBYNAME,
       TCPDAS.MODIFIEDBY,
       TCPDAS.MODIFIEDBYNAME,
       TCPDAS.CREATEDON,
       TCPDAS.MODIFIEDON,
       TCPDAS.ASC_NEWOREXISTING,
       TCPDAS.ASC_ONLINECLIENTSETUP,
       TCPDAS.ASC_BLUEBUTTONSETUP,
       TCPDAS.ASC_DATEBLUEBUTTONSETUP,
       TCPDAS.ASC_BLUEBUTTONSETUPBY,
       TCPDAS.ASC_BLUEBUTTONSETUPCHECKED,
       TCPDAS.ASC_DATEBLUEBUTTONSETUPCHECKED,
       TCPDAS.ASC_BLUEBUTTONSETUPCHECKEDBY,
       TCPDAS.ASC_IMAGOSETUP,
       TCPDAS.ASC_DATEIMAGOSETUP,
       TCPDAS.ASC_IMAGOSETUPBY,
       TCPDAS.ASC_OCCUPATIONOPTOUT,
       TCPDAS.ASC_DATEOCCOPTOUTSET,
       TCPDAS.ASC_OCCOPTOUTSETBY,
       TCPDAS.ASC_CONTRIBUTIONSSETUP,
       TCPDAS.ASC_DATEPAYMENTSCONTRIBUTIONSPREADSHEETUPDATE,
       TCPDAS.ASC_PAYMENTSCONTRIBUTIONSPREADSHEETUPDATEDBY,
       TCPDAS.ASC_TRANSFERINITIATED,
       TCPDAS.ASC_DATETRANSFERSINITIATED,
       TCPDAS.ASC_TRANSFERSINITIATEDBY,
       TCPDAS.ASC_WELCOMELETTERGENERATED,
       TCPDAS.ASC_DATEWELCOMELETTERGENERATED,
       TCPDAS.ASC_WELCOMELETTERGENERATEDBY,
       TCPDAS.ASC_EMAILCONFIRMATIONS,
       TCPDAS.ASC_DATEEMAILCONFIRMATIONS,
       TCPDAS.ASC_EMAILCONFIRMATIONSBY,
       TCPDAS.ASC_SENTFORCHECKING,
       TCPDAS.ASC_DATESENTFORCHECKING,
       TCPDAS.ASC_SENTFORCHECKINGBY,
       TCPDAS.ASC_CHECKINGCOMPLETE,
       TCPDAS.ASC_DATECHECKINGCOMPLETED,
       TCPDAS.ASC_CHECKINGCOMPLETEDBY,
       TCPDAS.ASC_WELCOMELETTERSENT,
       TCPDAS.ASC_DATEWELCOMELETTERSENT,
       TCPDAS.ASC_WELCOMELETTERSENTBY,
       TCPDAS.ASC_CLOSEASINCOMPLETE,
       TCPDAS.ASC_DATECLOSEDASINCOMPLETE,
       TCPDAS.ASC_CLOSEDASINCOMPLETEBY,
       TCPDAS.ASC_REASONCLOSEDASINCOMPLETE,
       TCPDAS.ASC_ASSIGNFLAG,
       TCPDAS.TRANSACTIONCURRENCYID,
       TCPDAS.TRANSACTIONCURRENCYIDNAME,
       TCPDAS.ASC_BLUEBUTTONSETUPBYID,
       TCPDAS.ASC_SENTFORCHECKINGBYID,
       TCPDAS.STATECODE
  from STAGE_LOAD.TD_CRM_PLAT_DYN_APAWORKITEM_STG TCPDAS
 inner join STAGE_CDI.CRM_PLAT_DYN_CODE_TYPE CPDCT
    on (TCPDAS.ASC_CATEGORY = CPDCT.CODE_NUMBER)
 where CPDCT.CODE_NUMBER is not null
   and CPDCT.CODE_TYPE = 'Asc_Category' 
   and CPDCT.CRM_TABLE_NAME = 'ASC_APAWORKITEM'

activities.name: sp-UPDATE_BATCH_AUDIT-TD_CRM_PLAT_DYN_INCIDENT_STG
activities.description: Writing audit data for the Copy Data activity that has just run
